fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.description: Email address of the sender optional with name
fromEmail.ai_hint: Email address of the sender optional with name

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
toEmail.ai_hint: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

ccEmail.name: ccEmail
ccEmail.description: Cc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
ccEmail.ai_hint: Cc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

bccEmail.name: bccEmail
bccEmail.description: Bcc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
bccEmail.ai_hint: Bcc Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

attachments.name: attachments
attachments.description: Name of the binary properties which contain data which should be added to email as attachment. Multiple ones can be comma-separated.
attachments.ai_hint: Name of the binary properties which contain data which should be added to email as attachment. Multiple ones can be comma-separated.
